title: The Very last thing from Pandora's Box
creator_contributor_role: Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT, production facilities
subject_group: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Life cycle, Human
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Life cycle, Human
abstract: Hope, though shrivelled, small and stuck to the bottom, springs eternal.
description: Beautifully drawn and coloured animation ponders human existence - the misery and fleetingness of life and its solace, hope. This work was produced as part of AIM (Centre for Animation and interactive Media), RMIT, 2003.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1004307; RMIT AIM Collection 2003; Active; 2003
